snippet: A pilot project is to determine whether some massive open online courses, or MOOCs, are similar enough to traditional college courses that they should be eligible for credit.
abstract: American Council on Education, leading umbrella group for higher education, along with online course provider Coursera, announce pilot project to determine whether some free online courses are similar enough to traditional college courses that they should be eligible for credit.
lead_paragraph: A pilot project is to determine whether some massive open online courses, or MOOCs, are similar enough to traditional college courses that they should be eligible for credit.

headline.seo: Free Online Courses to Be Evaluated for Possible College Credit
headline.main: College Credit Eyed for Online Courses
headline.print_headline: College Credit Eyed for Online Courses
